feedback: This course was amazing! The hands-on projects helped me build real-world applications.

name: Rahul Sharma
feedback: Very informative course with great explanations. Would love to see more real-world datasets.

name: Sophia Lee
feedback: The design principles taught here transformed my approach to UI/UX. Highly recommended!

name: Mohammed Faisal
feedback: Great course! The hands-on exercises were very helpful, but I wish there were more case studies.

name: Emily Carter
feedback: The instructor explained complex concepts in a simple way. I feel confident in ML now!

name: Daniel Brown
feedback: Great insights into SEO and social media marketing. A bit more depth on PPC would be nice.

name: Fatima Noor
feedback: Loved the project-based learning approach! The React Native section was very helpful.

name: James Wilson
feedback: A good introduction to ethical hacking. Would appreciate more real-world penetration testing examples.
